name: Pigeon
headline: Simplifying loans with your friends & family.
description:
Pigeon is a relationship based technology platform that facilitates the creation and management of loans between friends, family, loved ones, and anyone who trusts one another.

By providing smarter ways for people to mix money with their relationships, Pigeon seeks to empower individuals to borrow and lend money with the people they trust.

# Loan or Borrow Money with Friends & Family
Mixing money and relationships can be awkward. Make it easier with automatic reminders, payment tracking, legal docs, and more. Be smart. Loan money like never before.**Pigeon is free to use.**
[Create A Loan](https://www.usepigeon.io/<https:/app.usepigeon.io/signup>)[See How It Works](https://www.usepigeon.io/<#2-cta-video-section>)

## How Does Pigeon Work?
![People Showing Each Other Stuff](https://images.prismic.io/pigeon-loans/b0050b1a-0883-44b7-a356-a8aa26458e93_priscilla-du-preez-XkKCui44iM0-unsplash.jpg?auto=compress,format&rect=432,0,4608,3648&w=960&h=760)
### Start A Conversation
Millions of Americans loan with friends and family each year. It starts with a conversation on how you can help one another reach your financial goals.
![Spreadsheet Computer](https://images.prismic.io/pigeon-loans/feb31659-f7d0-496d-8216-808cf4caf7a8_austin-distel-744oGeqpxPQ-unsplash.jpg?auto=compress,format&rect=468,0,4997,3956&w=960&h=760)
### Create Your Loan
Invite a friend, family member, or someone you trust to get started on your loan. In minutes you'll be ready to go!
![People Hugging](https://images.prismic.io/pigeon-loans/5cc3829c-0a70-4030-aeeb-bee605c7f8bd_helena-lopes-PGnqT0rXWLs-unsplash.jpg?auto=compress,format&rect=432,0,4608,3648&w=960&h=760)
### Easy Reminders & Tracking
Easily track payments and set up automated reminders. No more awkward texts to friends and family that a payment is due!

## Getting Started Is Easy
It takes minutes to create your first loan.
[Get Started](https://www.usepigeon.io/<https:/app.usepigeon.io>)[Learn More](https://www.usepigeon.io/</ways-to-use-pigeon>)
## Simple Loans Between Family, Friends, and People You Trust
Mixing money with friends or family can be a frustrating experience. At Pigeon, we make creating and managing loans with others, smart, simple, easy, and rewarding. Set up the terms of your loan agreement or feel free to import a loan you already have ongoing, schedule your monthly payments, and start earning rewards today.
[Get Started](https://www.usepigeon.io/<https:/app.usepigeon.io>)[About Us](https://www.usepigeon.io/</about>)
### For Lenders
Help out the ones you care about the most, by lending as much as you want with no hidden fees, charges, or penalties on your end. We'll manage all of the headaches for you. Rest easy knowing that Pigeon will do everything in our power to reward your generosity & help you feel better helping others.
[Read more](https://www.usepigeon.io/<https:/www.usepigeon.io/topic/lending-money>)
### For Borrowers
Pigeon takes the awkwardness out of turning to your friends and family for financial support. Get all the tools you need to turn a painful experience into a positive one. Meet your financial goals with the help of your relationships and community.
[Read more](https://www.usepigeon.io/<https:/www.usepigeon.io/topic/borrowing-money>)
